articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Austria locks down unvaccinated as Europe fights fresh wave - New Straits Times
articles.description: VIENNA: Austria became the first European Union country on Monday to impose a lockdown on the unvaccinated and the first to start inoculating children as young as 5, as the virus strengthens its grip on the continent.
